text: Kelheim () is a town and municipality in Bavaria, Germany. It is the capital of the district Kelheim and is at the convergence of the rivers Altmühl and Danube. Kelheim has a population of around 15,750. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Kelheim360.de - Virtual 360° Panoramic Tour of old Town Kelheim Category:Kelheim (district) Category:Towns in Bavaria
title: Kelheim
